Package DBImplementation

Class LoginDBImplementation

java.lang.Object
DBImplementation.LoginDBImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loginable
public class LoginDBImplementation extends Object implements Loginable
The LoginDBImplementation class provides an implementation of the Loginable interface and handles database operations related to user login and worker information.
